snippet: French intervention in Mali and a rescue mission in Somalia have put President François Hollande in a more somber, and decisive, light.
abstract: News analysis; French intervention in Mali and rescue mission in Somalia have put President Francois Hollande in more somber and decisive light that could represent turning point in his presidency; Hollande has previously been criticized as indecisive and complacent.
lead_paragraph: French intervention in Mali and a rescue mission in Somalia have put President François Hollande in a more somber, and decisive, light.

headline.seo: François Hollande Surprises France With Firm Stance
headline.main: Hollande, Long Seen as Soft, Shifts Image With Firm Stance
headline.print_headline: Hollande, Long Seen as Soft, Shifts Image With Firm Stance
